description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. In rhythm action game "Painting Beats", it is a purpose to do the paint to the music and to update a high score. Let's select the difficulty that exists in your ability because it is prepared from an easy stage to a difficult stage.
